comments.body:
what do you think about extracting out the graph building part as well to avoid duplication in the tests?

Somewhat related example:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/conv2d_benchmark.py#L44

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@

def conv2d_layer(inputs, filters, kernel_size, strides=(1, 1), padding='valid',
                 data_format='channels_last', dilation_rate=(1, 1), name=None):
  dtype = inputs.dtype
